title: In An Epic Episode Of The Kapil Sharma Show, Kapil Dev To Appear Along With 1983 Cricket World Cup Winning Team
text:
View this post on Instagram
Kapil With Kapil @kapilsharma And Team Today Shooting With 1983 Cricket World Cup Team. On #TheKapilSharmaShow This Episode Is Going To #WorldCup1983 Special Episode.In Which All Member Of ICC Cricket World Cup 1983 Will Be The Guest. #KapilSharma #KapilDev
A post shared by Kapil Sharma Universe (@kapilsharma_universe) on Feb 23, 2019 at 2:51am PST
description: In the upcoming episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, legendary cricketer Kapil Dev will appear on the show – not alone but with his entire 1983 cricket world cup winning team. It’s going to be an historical moment.
